bibl.title: Metiochus at Polycrates' Court.
bibl.note: The chief object of the present note is to see to what extent the Persian version may help us to restore the principal Greek fragment [(re)published by: Herwig Maehler, ZPE 23 (1976) pp. 1-20 et pll. I-III] in the part where the two overlap. - 1. Historicity. - 2. The Overlapping Part.
bibl.seg: Hägg Tomas, Metiochus at Polycrates' Court.

The chief object of the present note is to see to what extent the Persian version may help us to restore the principal Greek fragment [(re)published by: Herwig Maehler, ZPE 23 (1976) pp. 1-20 et pll. I-III] in the part where the two overlap. - 1. Historicity. - 2. The Overlapping Part.
